none: Charles Meyer, New York. Text: "Free Sample Black Charles Meyer New York Originator of Black Exora Mascarillo for Darkening Eyebrows, Eye Lashes, Beards and Hair. By All First Class Toilet Goods Dealers." Text on reverse: "Exora Mascarillo: Black--Dark Brown--Medium Brown--Light Brown--Auburn--Blonde--Titian. Apply with moist brush to hair which must not be greasy. Comb hair still damp, when dry dress hair. Removed with soap and water. Established 1868."
